feedback.Physical Object: Included — A solid, bounded object with discrete shape.
feedback.Synthetic: Included — Manufactured and magnetized by human processes.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — Not of biological origin or design.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Does not require energy input; its field is a passive material property.
feedback.Structural: Included — Exerts stabilizing or positioning force on other objects.
feedback.Observable: Included — Perceptible directly or through magnetic detection.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Exhibits no autonomous behavior or internal transformation.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Included — Shaped and magnetized for functional uses across industries.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Included — Emits a static magnetic field, causing observable influence.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — Does not interpret or transform signals.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Stable material; no internal state changes without external force.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not designed for direct interaction.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — May be used in systems, but not inherently embedded in one.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — No internal control or autonomy.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not indispensable to a defined system on its own.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — May be interpreted metaphorically but is not inherently symbolic.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not encode or transmit meaning.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — Behavior governed by physical laws, not logical systems.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not made of meaningful modular subcomponents.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not guide or prescribe behavior.
feedback.Meta: Excluded — Not self-referential or conceptually reflective.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — No essential time-based structure or function.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists independently of social agreement.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined or categorized by formal institutions.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not tied to roles or identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — No direct governance or policy relevance.
feedback.Economically Significant: Included — Core to many technologies and industries with substantial market value.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — Not involved in ideological or governance structures.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — No role in cultural or ceremonial practice.

encoding_notes: Encoding applies to a standalone magnet as a passive functional object, excluding roles in symbolic or system-based contexts. Economic significance is included due to material-critical status in global industry.
